title: i cant update anymore
body:
whenever i open LoL i get a window saying this:

unspecified error occurred. please check logs for more information.

does anybody knows what i have to do bc now i cant play anymore

replies.body: This is happening to a lot of people, for whatever reason this update screwed a ton of people over. Try every trouble shooting thing if you want but I did and absolutely nothing changed.
When exactly or what percent are you receiving this error?  The issue may vary depending on when it's happening, but I'd like to help.  Let me know!
